Sergei Rachmaninoff

Lullaby (Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky)

1941 · Threlfall and Norris III/14

[IMSLP]

This is an arrangement of Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky’s Lullaby (op. 16 no. 1), originally written for voice and piano. Tchaikovsky also made two of his own arrangements of the song.

Duration: 4'

Difficulty: 4.5
